values.collection_read: Able to read collections you have marked as private
values.collection_write: Ability to create, manipulate and delete your collections.
values.activity_read: Allows access to read network activity feed
values.wip_write: Able to post, manipulate and delete a work in progress on your behalf
values.wip_read: Able to read works in progress marked as private
values.post_as: may act on your behalf to comment, follow users, view and appreciate projects
